title: Global PND and car navigation market size forecast 2005 to 2015
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market size in thousand units, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Market size in thousand units has rose over the Year.
Market size in thousand units is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2008, and lastly roughly constant from 2008 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
The highest Market size in thousand units, of value 51600.0 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Market size in thousand units, of value 12963.0 was reported at Year 2005
